amendment.description: An amendment numbered 39 printed in House Report 115-259 to add $161.725 million to the Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy for research and development to advance energy efficiency and renewable energy technologies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norcross amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 241 (Roll no. 421).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norcross amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 241 (Roll no. 421).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Norcross.
